Array.description: Mandatory input for the epigenetic age calculator, measured on the Illumina EPIC array or the 450K array or the 27k array.

DNAmAge.description: DNA methylation age=predicted age, pan tissue clock from Horvath 2013

AgeAccelerationDiff.description: Age acceleration measure defined simply as difference, i.e. DNAmAge minus chronological age

AgeAccelerationResidual.description: The recommended age acceleration measure based on a linear regression model, age adjusted version of DNAmAge

CD8T.description: Proportions of CD8 T cells, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

CD4T.description: Proportions of CD4 T cells, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

NK.description: Proportions of natural killer cells, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

Bcell.description: Proportions of B cells, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

Mono.description: Proportions of monocytes, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

Gran.description: Proportions of granulocytes, estimated using the method described in Houseman et al 2012

DNAmAgeHannum.description: Blood based estimator of age from Hannum 2013

PlasmaBlast.description: Abundance estimates of plasma blasts, estimated using the method described in Horvath and Levine 2015

CD8pCD28nCD45RAn.description: Abundance estimates of CD8+CD28-CD45RA- T cells (exhausted T Cells), estimated using the method described in Horvath and Levine 2015

CD8.naive.description: Abundance estimates of naive CD8 T cells, estimated using the method described in Horvath and Levine 2015

CD4.naive.description: Abundance estimates of naive CD4 T cells, estimated using the method described in Horvath and Levine 2015

DNAmAgeSkinBloodClock.description: Skin & blood clock estimate of age

DNAmGrimAge.description: Estimates mortality risk (in units of years), not an age estimator

DNAmTL.description: DNA methylation based estimator of leukocyte telomere length

AgeAccelGrim.description: Epigenetic measure of age acceleration, adjusted for chronological age

AgeAccelPheno.description: Epigenetic measure of age acceleration, adjusted for chronological age
